Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights staff friendly map explained main sites arrived recomended restaurant request twice breakfast plenty available spacious double single bed pillows werent comfortable bathroom fine toilet shower legs location train station ancient rome bit walk attractions

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff & excellent value.”
Reviews.Author: rydellgunness
Reviews.Content: finished eurotrip stayed paris rome amsterdam london edinburgh hotel amalfi stayed ideal location romes major attractions easy walk colosseum roman forum walked hotel trevi fountain spanish steps bit walk pleasant easy airport hotel 5 mins walk romes central station stazione termini spotless bigger hotels stayed found trip majority hotel europe pretty theres safe lock valuables airconditioning definitely essential visiting rome summer breakfast start day allowed late lunch lots bread pastries butter jams ham coffee tea staff super friendly francesco fortunate check drew major attractions shopping map checked internet attraction details closing times located store purchase del piero jerseys guy stay assistance definitely reccommend hotel excellent value money

Reviews.Title: “Great location - no frills - nice staff”
Reviews.Author: LoveholsHampshireUK
Reviews.Content: hotel 3 week holiday 3 star hotel wasnt expecting disappoint staff pleasant dire daughters okay ours luggage toilet sit sideways single double clean basic english speaking channels breakfast limited fresh juice eggs cooking facilities wait table werent breakfast doesnt matter facilities 10 min walk station 15 min walk hill amazing hotel – ancient rome doorstep

Reviews.Title: “Great location with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: beachlover325
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel amalfi july 1621 2010 424 stayed double larger expected hardly hot close 100 degrees air conditioning cold found throughout rome ac blowing warm air hotel responded quickly fixed dinner bed comfortable unless prefer firm mattress tired night busy days didnt matter cleaned daily housekeeper job bathroom tub hand held shower annoying didnt attach wall werent ours deal nice wall attachment dresser closet shelves safe clothes tv decent sized desk english channels deal tiny elevator bring suitcases person fit suitcases people hotel floors occasionally wake continental breakfast served daily types cereals assortment breads husband loved croissants yogurt coffee juice available purchase internet hotel 1 euro hour 3 euros 3 hours 10 euros day pretty slow check email look directions hotel staff helpful scheduled trip pompeii book directly hotel shuttle picks morning tour bus breakfast eat left hotel location close colosseum 10 minute walk roman forum 5 minute walk termini train station walked lot metro station close convenient sites easily happy choice stay rome recommend budget hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic holiday”
Reviews.Author: rocketracer
Reviews.Content: travelled amalfi parents weekend read reviews trip advisor looking forward stay reviews favourable found hotel booking hotel received confirmation email advised arrived leave bags sightseeing ready luckily ready arrived leave bags departure date fine fine clean perfectly adequate size hardly breakfast traditional continental breakfast perfectly adequate fresh rolls lovely hotel staff welcoming helpful provided map city advised transport suggested local restaurant visit returned nights called able advise mix tourists locals eating sign reasonably priced location little close station little seedy night transport links airport bus routes metro definitely recommend hotel friends stay return rome

Reviews.Title: “Convenient to train station”
Reviews.Author: JeannieColaSC
Reviews.Content: nice clean comfortable hotel staff friendly didnt help location convenient main train 5 minute walk theres subway stuff spanish steps fairly close vatican close walk spanish steps little exercise didnt business hotels trip hotel trip charge wireless didnt charge inconvenient pay run breakfast
